mapper.select: select shop_goods_no shopgoodsNo, shop_goods_class shopgoodsClass, shop_goods_name shopgoodsName, shop_goods_set shopgoodsSet, shop_goods_detail shopgoodsDetail, shop_goods_img shopgoodsImage, shop_goods_qty shopgoodsQty, shop_goods_price shopgoodsPrice from shop_goods

select shop_goods_no shopgoodsNo, shop_goods_class shopgoodsClass, shop_goods_name shopgoodsName, shop_goods_set shopgoodsSet, shop_goods_detail shopgoodsDetail, shop_goods_img shopgoodsImage, shop_goods_qty shopgoodsQty, shop_goods_price shopgoodsPrice from shop_goods where shop_goods_no = #{shopgoodsNo}
